doc:
Marion Bailey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marion_Bailey 0 Marion Bailey (born 5 May 1951) is a British actress. She is best known for her work with her partner, film director Mike Leigh, including the films Meantime (1983), All or Nothing (2002), Vera Drake (2004) and Mr. Turner (2014), for which she was nominated Supporting Actress of the Year by the London Film Critics' Circle. Marion_Bailey ( born_5_May_1951 ) is a_British_actress .
